definition: A sensory organ located in the head, typically used for visual perception and often associated with expressions of emotions or intentions. It is commonly used in various idiomatic expressions and metaphors.

examples.english: The eye is a sensory organ.

examples.german: Ich habe ein Auge auf dich geworfen.
examples.english: I have my eye on you.

examples.german: Er hat ein Auge f√ºr Details.
examples.english: He has an eye for details.

examples.german: Das Auge des Sturms ist ruhig.
examples.english: The eye of the storm is calm.
